name.description: name of the existing subnet. Must be unique name (with combination of VRF group, if supplied).

reserved_ip.description: If value of yes is passed, the suggested IP is reserved. Return value also adds reserved as yes or no.

return_ip_only.description: if true, final output is ONLY IP, for use in suggest_and_create_ip aciton chain

subnet_id.description: ID of the subnet to suggest the next available IP in

vrf_group.description: name of the VRF group - useful if you have overlapping subnets in your Device42 instance

vrf_group_id.description: ID of the VRF group - useful if you have overlapping subnets in your Device42 instance
